FuncDef: This command configures a destination MAC address or range to be used as a MAC filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the 48-bit IEEE mac address to be used as a match criterion. Values-HH:HH:HH:HH:HH:HH or HH-HH-HH-HH-HH-HH where H is a hexadecimal digit.
Specifies a 48-bit mask that can be configured using:. Values-0x00000000000000 - 0xFFFFFFFFFFFF. ParamDefault: Default- 0xFFFFFFFFFFFF (exact match)
